author: ate
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-657: Installer fails with firewall
ant-installer doesn't seem to require its configs to specify a DTD at runtime, while if it is defined its trying to look it up remotely.
So I simply commented out the DTDs in the config files

author: ryan
msg: SOLR-231 -- use UTF-8 encoding unless something else is specified.
